body:
Update info:
dev-db branch has completed multi database support, and as dev mail said,  this branch will be deleted later.  

for now please submit code to dev branch
It's my mistake,thank you for your reply.
could you please submit this to branch 'dev'
could you please submit this to branch 'dev'

ok

Merge to branch 'dev'
already fixed by https://github.com/apache/incubator-dolphinscheduler/pull/1430
it's already fixed.should close the issues.
Thanks,We will fix it lator
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28328355/70532430-fd2cc900-1b91-11ea-8cf0-89c753062425.png)

If you start worker without any profile, The method `.getAppender("TASKLOGFILE")` will return NULL, Because it define in `worker_logback.xml`.

Try to start worker with`-Dspring.profiles.active=worker`

> Hi, i found @DaTa annotation for this project. But it 's still has setter and getter method. i think it is duplicate code. I want to remove it! What do you think?

Hi brother, we discuss and confirm, it's duplicate code . so would you like to fix this issue?

Now all datatype use same method ` stmt.setString(index,value);` even DATE and TIMESTAMP.

So i had improved it #1439 . 
If datatype is DATE  then use `stmt.setDate(index, java.sql.Date.valueOf(value));` , 
if datatype is TIMESTAMP  then use `stmt.setTimestamp(index, java.sql.Timestamp.valueOf(value));`.

When use DATE , datatype must use Date and the param format must use `$[yyyy-MM-dd]` , 
When use TIMESTAMP , datatype must use TIMESTAMP and the param format must use `$[yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss]`.

> @uzdz
> for english only,
> please update the title and content to english.

Okay
Is this version 1.1.0? You can wait for the latest version 1.2.0, which is OK

thank you very much.
i think this is a simply change on the code, tThe main problem is that this value is set appropriately. 64 or 128, 256 ?

Is it necessary to set the MaxLength property? If a user-defined parameter corresponds to the table field of MySQL, in order to control the length of MySQL field, I think 256 should be enough, but if there is no MySQL limit, I don't think this property needs to be specified.

This is just a suggestion. Now I solve this problem by writing parameter values directly after the script.

> 描述：多个master或worker节点时，监控中心UI只显示第一个节点的仪表盘信息
> 原因：数组未设置id字段，导致页面循环时，渲染的组件id是一样的
> 
> Fixes #645

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28628088/70590344-5e45b280-1c0d-11ea-8bc9-c13578cf4cfb.png)
The 1.2.0 version is currently available, which version do you use?

> 
> Hi brother, we discuss and confirm, it's duplicate code . so would you like to fix this issue?

yes，i do

I am currently version 1.1.0，I upgrade 1.2.0 and try again，thank you.
1.2.0 version resolve this issue

this user-defined parameters are saved in db with json type, the field type is text. so there is not length limit in mysql.
but i think every input should be specified in case of memory problem. and 256 should be enough.  
if you are willing to, please submit pr to improve that.
welcome pr to  fix it
+1, please fix it
anybody who want to try to fix it ?

Dose the user name check rule allow contain `. `?
Is there any progress of this issue? We meet this problem too. Because current pool permission management, we have to develop by account-sharing
The maxlength is 128 in version 1.2 ,  Does it need change to 256?
please discussion on dev mail list
这个单机版本可以用吗？具体怎么用呢？

There are many places in the installation script that are installed through yum. In addition, the docking with zookeeper is through kazoo, a three-party Library of Python. This is also installed through pip. How to deal with it offline?

> 这个单机版本可以用吗？具体怎么用呢？

Yes, please refer to https://github.com/apache/incubator-dolphinscheduler/pull/267 for the detailed usage. Especially part 3, how to use with Minio . 

Note: that was based on dev-1.1.0 branch,  but in the newest 1.2.0 branch, the configuration files may be in different location, please double check.

@lenboo  
  hi, I have fix the issue in the pr, may be you can review it, so I can close the issue

> I agree to remove the alert module
> 
> But
> 
> Email, SMS and other alarms can be tools directly, put in common module, define the communication interface between them, and call directly
> 
> I personally think that if you want to modify this, one PR will be done, and multiple PRs will be more complicated.

Sure, Mr. Qiao
please cat README.md, there would be 'how to build'.

hi, @lenboo 
     In reading the source code, I happened to see here and also saw the mailing list. I found that the main problems appeared in the following three places:

1. ProcessDao # submitTaskInstanceToMysql,  saveTaskInstance The method returned true or false to indicate whether the insert was successful, but it is directly ignored here, this may lead to inserting a task to zk that does not exist in db,

2. ProcessDao # submitTask, submitTaskToQueue also returned true or false to indicate whether the insert was successful, also be ignored here, it's the same question,

3. and, in the taskQueue.add() method,  the exception was discarded directly, just printed an error log,  but submitTaskToQueue() is to determine whether the addition is successful by catching the exception,  This will cause the method to always return to add successfully even if the task fails to add, 

This is all the problems I found, maybe you can check again if there are other problems, if not, can you allow me to fix thees bug? I am very willing to do this job, and maybe you can review it after I finish, I just need a little time to fix it, thanks,
